overview: Shot on Oct. 6, 2020. This video is my assignment of “Romeo and Juliet” monologue examination, the character I chose is the Prist. In case of showing myself in front of the camera and reciting monologues, I chose to shoot this video in a very lazy way. This video is edited and produced right before the deadline, however, I haven’t got a chance to show it in front of my classmates and teachers. 2 years later, I found it in my webdisk and decided to upload it on Bilibili and Youtube as a memento.
title: Romeo and Juliet Monologue
